title: The Study of disagreement between characters in the film Ten things i hate about you
abstract: In communication, people cannot avoid expressing disagreements when they have different ideas, opinions, or solutions and this might affect human interactions. A speaker who is disagreed a lot might feel offended and this will affect the interaction between participants. Disagreement is one language functions that is considered as an act which by its nature threatens someone's positive face. The writer is interested in observing disagreements in the film Ten Things I Hate About You which is present the life style of American teenagers. The writer is curious to know what disagreement strategy is used the most by them. In addition, the expressions or the mimics of the characters could be seen, so that it helped the writer to understand the expression of disagreement better. This research was a descriptive qualitative one while the writer got the data from the conversation among the characters. The writer analyzed all characters that were involved in all disagreement and classified the strategy of disagreement based on Garcia theory. The writer found out that the strategy used mostly by the characters was the giving reason strategy. Besides, the characters also tended to use strong denial strategy to show his/ her disagreement
